registeration_info.nr_orgName: Tungri Gonpa Cultural And Welfare Society

source_info.purpose:
1 Digitization of Antiquities and Artifacts
2 Documentation of Antiquities and 
   Manuscripts
3 To organize trips to the young students of Tungri Gonpa to Monuments
4 To take up conservation work of manuscripts and train students
5 Training for students for preservation of Manuscripts
6 Awareness programmes to educate general public of social evils and preservation and conservation of manuscripts of cultural properties
7 Since Tungri Gonpa Cultural
